mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adv_record (userId, advertId, money , addTime) VALUES (#{userId}, #{advertId}, #{money} , #{addTime})
mapper.select: SELECT ar.id, ar.userId, ar.advertId, ar.addTime, ar.money, aa.title FROM adv_record ar INNER JOIN adv_advert aa ON ar.advertId = aa.id WHERE userId = #{userId}
